attributes.action: hold a general election instead of handing the power of number10 to gordon brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that we are now run by big brother. i think like im sure many of you do that there should be a general election instead of tony blair giving power to gorden brown.we the people should have the final say who gets the prime ministers job. this would be totally fair please sign the petition to say that you want a general election and lets make our voices heard yet again

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
